titleInfo.title: Female adolescents’ reproductive health decision-making capacity and contraceptive use in sub-Saharan Africa: What does the future hold?

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Ahinkorah, Bright Opoku, Hagan Jr., John Elvis, Seidu, Abdul-Aziz, Sambah, Francis, Adoboi, Faustina, Schack, Thomas, and Budu, Eugene. 2020. “Female adolescents’ reproductive health decision-making capacity and contraceptive use in sub-Saharan Africa: What does the future hold?”. PLOS ONE 15 (7): 1-20.
